channel.title: animal on fractal's sound practice
channel.description: Recent content in animal on fractal's sound practice

item.title: Sound Funeral
item.description: These unique encounters became a way of social support and validation. Sound as an omnipresent and uncloseable source of vibrations, reconnects humans with the rhythms and cycles of nature, and in a sense, promotes a deeper understanding and appreciation of the interconnectedness of living beings.
